product_name: Platypus GravityWorks Filter System Bottle Kit - 2 Liter
long_description: Platypus took the already fast and easy-to-use GravityWorksTM filter system and came up with this smaller and lighter 2-liter version to fill your water bottles on backcountry adventures.
short_description: Platypus took the already fast and easy-to-use GravityWorksTM filter system and came up with this smaller and lighter 2-liter version to fill your water bottles on backcountry adventures.
